English: Chat in a chat.
A little of my political memories that are worth noting at the present time.
Reap:

Things began with the request for the return of all political exiles. FHC, Brizola, Chico Buarque and so on.
They fled, but to give conditions for their return, the F. A. prepared a document for them to come in peace.

They arrived and soon began a movement of "direct elections for president" also known as "Direct now".
The thief was in that cake.

They led the population that we had to have the right to choose our rulers.
Always remembering that mayors, councilors, governors and state deputies had normal elections and the entire population voted, with the exception of the illiterate. We just didn't choose the president or the Congress.

The Direct Movement has already grown in the big cities and the (see what I'm going to write) intense POPULAR outcry in the streets of the country, caused the military to hand over the government.
Do you understand the strength of the people?
